title: "IllegalArgumentException: LocalVariablesSorter only accepts expanded frames" when logging in PanacheRepository
body:
### Describe the bug

Using Quarkus logging in a PanacheRepository crashes the build. I'm using Kotlin, haven't tried in with Java.

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

1. Start a new (Kotlin) Quarkus project, for the reproducer I did `quarkus create app org.acme:rest-kotlin-quickstart --extension='kotlin,resteasy-reactive-jackson'`
2. Add these extensions `quarkus-jdbc-postgresql` and `quarkus-hibernate-orm-panache-kotlin`
3. Create a class extending PanacheRepository
4. Create a data class with @Entity annotation for the repository type since PanacheRepository is generic
5. Create a function that tries to log using e.g. `Log.error("Test Quarkus logging")` or `Log.info("Test Quarkus logging")`
6. Try to build and observe the failure.

See attached reproducer.

[rest-kotlin-quickstart.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/10345223/rest-kotlin-quickstart.zip)


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux pop-os 5.19.16-76051916-generic #202210150742\~1666053244\~22.04\~cf07008 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Tue O x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 17.0.4.1 2022-08-12 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-17.0.4.1+1 (build 17.0.4.1+1) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-17.0.4.1+1 (build 17.0.4.1+1, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

Reproducer: 2.15.1.Final, project where I noticed the bug: 2.14.1.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Reproducer: Apache Maven 3.8.6 (84538c9988a25aec085021c365c560670ad80f63), project where I noticed the bug: Gradle 7.5.1
